name: Delay Decay
description:
You are Greeny, an aspiring superhero, who is trying to appease a moody deity to delay decay. As decay is inevitable, eventually an alternative solution is needed.
  •  Move with keyboard wasd or arrow keys - interact with LMB or E
  •  Move with controller left stick - Interact with A
  • I did everything myself in around two weeks.

Tools used:

  • Unity, C#, Cubase, Photoshop and Krita
  • Fonts are downloaded from Google Fonts
